ComicInfo.Summary: “INTO THE HORNET’S NEST!” Double the Dragons! Double the action! Malcolm Dragon teams up with Paul Dragon, his father from another reality now equipped with a cyborg arm to take down the Vicious Circle once and for all.
ComicInfo.Title: Bride of Wax Part 3; Into the Hornet's Nest!
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Dave Kelly,Dean Haspiel,Dave Kelly,Dean Haspiel,Erik Larsen
